fields.title: Kudya – Africa’s Marketplace & Super App
fields.description:
Kudya: Transforming How Africa Shops, Eats & Connects

Kudya is Africa’s first true super app. We built an end-to-end digital ecosystem—branding, mobile/web apps, payments, logistics, and multi-language. Kudya is now the go-to platform for cross-border commerce in Africa.

  • Custom e-commerce & delivery engine
  • Vendor & buyer dashboards
  • Secure wallet & payment gateway

Built with Django, React Native, Stripe, and AWS.

fields.title: Family Cladding – Home Makeover Platform
fields.description:
Family Cladding: Elevate Your Space, Effortlessly

Family Cladding is the leading platform for home and commercial cladding solutions. We designed a seamless journey from product discovery to project completion, empowering homeowners and contractors alike.

  • Intuitive product galleries
  • Automated quote and booking tools
  • Lead management & CRM dashboard

Stack: Django, Next.js, Postgres, Tailwind CSS.

fields.title: TBAE – Team Building Africa Events
fields.description:
TBAE: Africa’s Top Team-Building Platform

TBAE reimagined team-building. We delivered a high-converting site with instant booking, an interactive event gallery, online payments, and automated feedback. TBAE’s digital transformation tripled inbound leads and improved operations across 5 countries.

  • Custom booking system
  • Event galleries & testimonials
  • Integrated payment & invoicing

Stack: Django, Next.js, Stripe, Metabase analytics.

fields.title: Scaling E-commerce Across Africa
fields.content:
• Launched in 3 countries in under 6 months
  • Automated order workflow reduced errors by 40%
  • 60% sales increase for partners in 6 months

fields.title: Digital Transformation for Construction
fields.content:
• Automated quoting reduced admin time by 50%
  • 100% increase in online bookings
  • Real-time lead analytics for management

fields.title: Revolutionizing Team Building
fields.content:
• Tripled lead volume after launch
  • 95% client satisfaction
  • Reduced manual work by 75%
